{
  "data" => {
            "id" => user.id,
            "email" => user.email,
            "provider"=> user.provider,
            "latitude"=> user.latitude,
            "longitude"=> user.longitude,
            "uid"=> user.email,
            "subscriber"=> user.subscriber,
            "address"=> user.address,
            "role"=> user.role,
            "type" => "user"
  }
}
